name: Shipwrecked (mvrey, PolyB, vavmusicmagic)
description:
A very metroidvania pirate game.

Keyboard Inputs:

  • Use the keyboard arrows or WASD to move around.
  • Space to jump.
  • Press M to open the map.
  • Q switches controls between the main character and his parrot pet.
  • Left, middle, and right mouse buttons perform attacks after you unlock them.

Controller Inputs:

  • Left Stick to move around.
  • A Button to jump.
  • L1 to open the map.
  • R1 switches controls between main character and his parrot pet.
  • X, Y, and B buttons perform attacks after you've unlocked them.
